Issue: What platforms are Navi-X compatible with?

Explanation: XBMC: Windows, Mac, and Linux. Boxee: Windows, Mac, Linux and Boxee Box. XBMC4Xbox : original Xbox (modified). iOS : Apple TV 1 & 2, iPhone 4, and iPad when jailbroken. Android: Phones and Tablets via Amo Navi-X. PS3 (modified): Showtime Media Center.
